description: SampBias is a tool for sampling bias resultant segments between paired nodes on anatomical surfaces.

plimit.title: Path Limit
plimit.description: Maximum length of path along surface in mm. Default is 50 mm.

dlimit.title: Euclidean Distance Limit
dlimit.description: Maximum length of euclidean distance in mm. Default is 1000 mm.

prefix.title: Output Prefix
prefix.description: Output results into a proper surface-based dataset.

segdo.title: Segment Display Object
segdo.description: Output a displayable object file that contains segments between paired nodes.
